channel.title: Ian Smale on UESI SongBook
channel.description: Recent content in Ian Smale on UESI SongBook

item.title: Father God, I wonder How I Managed
item.description: John 14:23 Father God, I wonder how I managed to exist Without the knowledge of your parenthood, And Your loving care, But now I am Your child, I am adopted in Your family, And I will never be alone, ‘Cause Father God, You’re there beside me. I will sing Your praises (3) Forever more.
